text: Kelly Ward (born November 17, 1956) is an American actor and voice director for television animation. As an actor, he is best known for his role as T-Bird Putzie in the 1978 movie Grease, and as a voice director, he is best known for his work on the Cartoon Network animated series Ed, Edd n Eddy. ==Other websites== * Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from San Diego Category:American voice actors
title: Kelly Ward
